thread.title: Bambilynn Stewart
thread.title_full: ADS Sports Eyewear reviewed by Bambilynn Stewart

author: Bambilynn Stewart
title: Bambilynn Stewart
text:
First day on the mountain with my new Oakley prescription goggles and I CAN ACTUALLY SEE WHAT I HAVE BEEN MISSING THE PAST TWO YEARS. Sense I can NO LONGER wear contacts this seemed like a great idea. Turns out IT IS Thank you ADS SPORTS. You put the F back in Fun!!! ðŸ˜€
Mrs. Bambilynn Stewart
